predicate.note: Frames file for 'stipulate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: define arbitrarily

example.name: arg1 always sentential?
example.text: Maxicare said the plan stipulates that enrollees in the company's health plans will have valid claims covered in full.
example.arg: enrollees in the company's health plans will have valid claims covered in full

roleset.note: Leave non-wh complementizers ('that') out of the arg1.
